name: GATE SIX: CYBER PERSONA
description:
Your future awaits behind Gate Six!

In the year 2079, the world of is ruled by a sinister cyber force. Its inhabitants connect via cyber persona into a virtual world called Gate Six, which promises eternal life at the cost of one's soul...

You play as Rex, a Cyber Persona who's discovered the corruption underpinning Gate Six. Traverse the dystopian streets through a unique hexagonal exploration system, create a powerful team with other virtual personas and fight the madness with a dazzling array of cyber skills in this

The mystery of Gate Six awaits you!

◈ Features ◈

1. A rich story set in a cyberpunk genre universe
- Log in to explore six cyber worlds and develop your own Persona.
- Enjoy the twists and turns of an immersive story that'll keep you guessing!

2. Classic turn-based RPG battles + positioning-based combos!
- Position your Cyber Personas to create the ultimate combo synergy.
- Use skill points strategically to unleash the most powerful damage effect.

3. Strategic maps that require strategic dungeon manuevering.
- More than just a random enemy encounter, dungeons require strategic decision making
- Paths diverge according to your decisions :O

4. Dazzing graphics and over 60 characters to choose from. And much more!

[COMMUNITY] https://www.facebook.com/Gatesix.EN/

[PRIVACY] flero_privacy@flerogames.com

IN-APP PAYMENTS: GATE SIX: CYBER PERSONA is free to play but you can buy virtual goods to use in the game.
Having problems? Got a question? We’d love to hear from you!
Please contact us at: gatesix_EN@flerogames.com

GATE SIX: CYBER PERSONA Supports English, 한국어, 中文简体.

* Customer Service is supported in English, Simplified Chinese and Korean.
